definition: birdwatching
surname Guan
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
Taoist monastery/palace gate watchtower/platform
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
variant of 屌[diao3]/penis

sentences.english: Birding is a fun, rewarding hobby that is easy to get started with.
sentences.chinese: 观鸟是一种有趣而有益的爱好，也也很容易起步。

sentences.english: One passive method of control is to plant the tree in a large aviary wire basket.
sentences.chinese: 其中被动控制方法，是植物树在一大片观鸟丝篮。

sentences.english: She encourages them to join the Birdwatching Club to get more information .
sentences.chinese: 她鼓励他们加入观鸟俱乐部来得到更多的信息。

sentences.english: I would like to become a member of the Birdwatching Club.
sentences.chinese: 我想成为观鸟俱乐部的成员。

sentences.english: Basic guidance on how to choose the best bird-watching binoculars.
sentences.chinese: 基本指导如何选择最好的观鸟望远镜。

sentences.english: Bird watching is just about the most unobjectionable hobby in the world.
sentences.chinese: 观鸟是刚刚在世界最反感的嗜好。

sentences.english: Small breeding lofts and huge joining free flight open air aviaries.
sentences.chinese: This小育种阁楼和巨大的加入自由飞行露天观鸟。

sentences.english: Christmas bird-watching is in full swing in the U. S.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，圣诞节前后观鸟达到高潮。

sentences.english: Bird lovers can also enjoy the variety of birds here, the activities.
sentences.chinese: 观鸟爱好者也可以在这里观赏到各种鸟类的活动。

sentences.english: Many bird-watching guides already identify the Italian sparrow as a separate species.
sentences.chinese: 许多观鸟指南已经把意大利麻雀确定为单个的物种了。

sentences.english: A map and a bird-watches' field checklist are available at the front desk.
sentences.chinese: 前台有地图和观鸟地点一览表可供拿取。

sentences.english: Go hiking, go birdwatching, get a dog, walk to work.
sentences.chinese: 去远足，去观鸟，养一条狗，走路上班。
